dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] content theft]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 11, 2006 5:13 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; s_drozd@yahoo.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] content theft]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] content theft
Date: Wed, 11 Jan 2006 13:14:57 -0800 (PST)
From: Serge Drozd <s_drozd@yahoo.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com

Hello
I am writing to you with a concern. I am a 3d modeler and built a lot of
computer models and has recently discovered that someone has been stealing
my creations and modifying them while taking all the credit for work. While
further investigation I was advised to contact you as you are suppose to
hosting their website. This is the site address, www.ascendence.net

I tried to contact the administrator of the site regarding this matter but
received a negative reply on this matter which pretty much ignored my
request to have my work removed off their server.

I would like to try and resolve this situation without any further, higher
action taken.

sincerely

Serge Drozd

__________________________________________________
Do You Yahoo!?
Tired of spam?  Yahoo! Mail has the best spam protection around
http://mail.yahoo.com


- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFDxZEOvK/XpJs6oyURAsM/AJ0SUXbQqaIsg0kaXfUw30OGckei7gCgntk8
DtjxQAtKJu1UEira8H7/Gow=
=L29G
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
